Package toffeeSystem

Class userAuthentication

java.lang.Object
toffeeSystem.userAuthentication
public class userAuthentication extends Object
The `userAuthentication` class represents a system for authenticating users.

  • Constructor Details

    • userAuthentication

      public userAuthentication()
      Constructs a userAuthentication object with no parameters.

  • Method Details

    • verifyLogin

      public String verifyLogin(String username, String password) throws Exception
      Verifies the login of a user by checking if their username and password match a record in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user trying to login
      password - the password entered by the user trying to login
      Returns:
      the ID of the user if the login is successful, or null if it fails
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error with the database connection or SQL statement

    • signUp

      public void signUp(String userN, String email, String password, String phoneNum, String address, String type) throws Exception
      Adds a new user to the database with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      userN - the name of the new user
      email - the email address of the new user
      password - the password of the new user
      phoneNum - the phone number of the new user
      address - the address of the new user
      type - the type of the new user (e.g. admin, customer)
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error with the database connection or SQL statement

    • sendOTP

      public String sendOTP(String email) throws Exception
      Sends an email containing the OTP to the specified email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the recipient
      Returns:
      The OTP that was generated and sent
      Throws:
      Exception - If there was an error sending the email
